title: # 386 - Tom Papa & ME
description:
Today I sit down with comedian Tom Papa to talk about his Super Bowl commercial, Kobe’s passing, Rogans Bernie Sanders drama, hot air balloons, and much more!

Check out Tom’s brand new Netflix special “You’re Doing Great” now! 

This episode is brought to you by Hims. A one stop shop for hair loss, skincare, and sexual wellness for men. Get your first month free at www.forhims.com/bertcast 

This episode is also brought to you by Mercari. Don’t let your old stuff go to waste. You can find Mercari on the app stores or at www.mercari.com 

This episode is also brought to you by Turbo Tax. TurboTax Live gives you personal access to experienced CPAs and EAs who are there for you, even on nights and weekends. So, you can be sure to get your best possible refund and feel 100% confident in your taxes. Go to www.turbotax.com today.

This episode is also brought to you by Undercover Tourist. Start planning your next theme park vacation now by visiting www.UndercoverTourist.com/bert  

The Berty Boy Tour is on sale now! Get your tickets at www.bertbertbert.com

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com

To Follow me on.. 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/bertkreischer  

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer  

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer  

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/Akreischer
